scripts.dev: concurrently 'cd src/main/webapp && npm run build:dev' 'mvn package appengine:run'
scripts.prod: cd src/main/webapp && npm run build:prod && cd ../../../ && mvn package appengine:run
scripts.deploy: cd src/main/webapp && npm run build:prod && cd ../../../ && mvn package war:war appengine:deploy
